contentrichtext.text: {{Three other uses|[[the Kooks]] song|the [[Willie Cobbs]] song|You Don't Love Me (Willie Cobbs song)|the [[Stephanie McIntosh]] song|Tightrope (Stephanie McIntosh album)|the [[Dawn Penn]] song|You Don't Love Me (No, No, No)}} {{Infobox Single | Name = You Don't Love Me | Cover = You Don't Love Me.png | Artist = [[The Kooks]] | from Album = [[Inside In/Inside Out]] | Released = 9 January 2006 | Format = [[gramophone record|7"]], [[CD single|CD]], [[Maxi single|Maxi-CD]] | Recorded = 2005 | Genre = [[Alternative rock]]/[[Post-punk]] | Length = 2:35 | Label = [[Virgin Records]] | Producer = [[Tony Hoffer]] | Last single = "[[Sofa Song]]" <br /> (2005) | This single = "'''You Don't Love Me'''"<br />(2006) | Next single = "[[Naïve (song)|Naïve]]"<br />(2006) |}} "'''You Don't Love Me'''" is a song by [[British People|British]] [[Independent music|indie]] [[rock band]] [[The Kooks]] and is featured on their [[debut album]], ''[[Inside In/Inside Out]]''. It was released 9 January 2006 as the lead [[Single (music)|single]] from that album, charting at #12 in the [[UK Singles Chart]] (see [[2006 in British music]]). ==Track listings== *CD <small>VSCDT1910</small> #"You Don't Love Me" – 2:35 #"Slave to the Game" – 3:00 *7" <small>VS1910)</small> #"You Don't Love Me" – 2:35 #"Lonely Cat" – 3:00 *Maxi-CD <small>VSCDX1910</small> #"You Don't Love Me" (live at the Garage) – 2:50 #"See the World" (acoustic - live at [[Abbey Road Studios|Abbey Road]]) – 2:25 #"The Window Song" #"You Don't Love Me" (video) #"See the World" (video) ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Chart (2006) !align="left"|Peak<br>position<ref>{{cite web|url=http://acharts.us/song/9972 |title=The Kooks - You Don't Love Me - Music Charts |accessdate=2007-11-30 |publisher=acharts.us}}</ref> |- |align="left"|[[UK Singles Chart]] |align="center"|12 |} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{The Kooks}} [[Category:2006 singles]] [[Category:The Kooks songs]]
